name: 玄女诛魔录
description:
游戏简介"Xuannv Zhumo Lu" is a traditional style of 2D action adventure game. In the game, there are six different styles and crisscross the huge world. Players will explore decadent temples, deep grottoes, fiery caves, mysterious towers, taboo temples and dark abysses. Players will fight with many demons, get to know and help the innocent, and finally go deep into the main hall of the grottoes, and uncover the truth of the pantheon of Wanmo grottoes and Xuannu themselves.游戏特色Detailed 2D hand-painted art
All the materials in this game are hand drawn.
Beautiful and lovely girl
The protagonist of the game is a young, beautiful and superb martial arts girl with more than 200 frames of full hand-painted animation.
Exquisite character drawing and CG
There are many exquisite characters and CG events in the game.
Rich 2D action elements
In the game, players can operate the protagonist to move, jump, jump, sprint, climb, hang, combo, use spirit power and many other actions.
Explore a vast world of overlapping similarities
Magic hidden temple, thousand face cave, ice and fire cave, taboo temple, thunder and India twin towers, the nether abyss, and the hall of ten thousand demons. Player's adventure will be launched in this numerous connected and crisscross world!
Dozens of strange enemies with different styles
Many demons enemies and epic level demons! Face and kill the most evil demons in the adventure!
